about_the_game:
Welcome, reincarnated in Fegefeuer!

This is Fegefeuer Soul Tower, an cozy adventure game within the Fegefeuer.

Fegefeuer is a mysterious world between Hell and Heaven.
Build a Home and Fight your way through the Soul Tower to finally reach Heaven.




The Soul Tower has 100 floors that you have to overcome.
You can free NPCs in the Soul Tower to increase the capabilities of your home.




Relax on your farm to craft and grow everything imaginable.
Perfect after a hard encounter in the Soul Tower.




Equipment and powerful Gems will drop.
Free the legendary Alchemist to unlock powerful potions and socket Gems in your Equipment.




Every journey is best with friends by your side.
Play with up to 4 Players through this epic adventure.

Can you escape from Fegefeuer and reach Heaven?

name: Fegefeuer Soul Tower Demo
short_description: Fegefeuer Soul Tower is a Cozy Adventure (Up to 4 Player). Manage a Shop, Farm and City while fighting through a Tower to escape the Fegefeuer.
